questions.question: Which of the following is a synonym of read?
The original inhabitants of a state. Give one word
I don’t want to argue ………………….. you.
I …………………… him in October.
questions.description: When we say when something happened, we use the simple past.

questions.question: When I reached their home, they ……………………….
questions.description: To talk about the earlier of two past actions, we use the past perfect.

questions.question: You ……………………. consult a doctor.
questions.description: Had better or better had is  used to give strong advice.

questions.question: I am not late, ……………………?
questions.description: We use an affirmative tag after a negative statement.

questions.question: She has written a story. Change into passive.
questions.description: In the present perfect we make the passive verb form with has/have + been + past participle form of the verb.
answers: A story is written by her.
A story has written by her.
A story has been written by her.

questions.question: It is no use ……………………. with her.
questions.description: An ing form is used after it is no use.

questions.question: You can take ……………………. of these roads to reach the station.
questions.description: Either means one or the other.

questions.question: It has been a long time ……………………. I met him.
The firemen …………………… the fire in two hours.
questions.description: To put out is to extinguish.
